channel.title: functions on grady.dev
channel.description: Recent content in functions on grady.dev

item.description: Go Links are a system used interally at google to create semantically meaningful short links. Grady.In replicates this functionality for use outside of the company, allowing anyone to construct short and human readable links. This was my first forray into a serverless architechure. The system is built using Google Cloud Functions. The primary function validates a request and writes the new link (as a simple redirect) to a CDN. The client (when looking at the grady.
